naslov: EKSKLUZIVNA PONUDA!!! VILA 400M OD MORA: Premantura, 420.00 m2 (prodaja)
opis: U ponudi smo dobili ovu eksluzivnu vilu od 689m2 sa bazenom i pogledom na more. Ova vrhusko građena samostojeća vila sa četiri apartmana nalazi se na površini od 810 m2, a nalazi se na samo 400 m do mora! U prizemlju komforan stan koji sadrži dnevni boravak, blagovaonicu s kuhinjom, dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonicu s dodatnim wc-om i veliku terasu s izlazom na bazen. Na prvom spratu su dva studija, a na drugom spratu još jedan apartman. U suterenu se nalazi još dodatni peti stan. Kuća ima i garažu sa prostorom za dva automobila, i 3 mjesta na okućnici. Kvaliteta gradnje je izuzetna, a opremljena je vrhunskim namještajem i modernom bijelom tehnikom. Ova vila uistinu nudi izniman spoj luksuza, funkcionalnosti i udobnosti u prekrasnom okruženju! Prodaje se kompletno namješten i opremljen. Vila je kategorizirana i vrlo uspješno se iznajmljuje tokom turističke sezone Uz vrhunske materijale, maksimalnu udobnost, moderan dizajn i fantastičnu lokaciju, vila je izvrsna investicija u vašu budućnost. --- We have this exclusive 689m2 villa with a swimming pool and sea view on offer. This superbly built detached villa with four apartments is located on an area of ​​810 m2, and is located only 400 m from the sea! On the ground floor, a comfortable apartment with a living room, dining room with kitchen, two bedrooms, bathroom with additional toilet and a large terrace with access to the pool. On the first floor there are two studios, and on the second floor another apartment. In the basement there is an additional fifth apartment. The house also has a garage with space for two cars, and 3 spaces in the garden. The quality of construction is exceptional, and it is equipped with top-quality furniture and modern white goods. This villa truly offers an exceptional combination of luxury, functionality and comfort in a beautiful setting! It is being sold fully furnished and equipped. The villa is categorized and is very successfully rented out during the tourist season With top-quality materials, maximum comfort, modern design and a fantastic location, the villa is an excellent investment in your future.
